attributes.additional_details:
Department for Business, Innovation and Skills

The Tertia Trust was started in the 80's by Mr &Mrs Hargreaves.
It was a RAF base turned childrens holiday camp .
But although always basic with struggling funding  was a hive of laughter and mischief.A place of learning ,safety, morals,and wonderful memories .Often by children who were struggling ,had a poor standard of life or terrible back grounds,.
Govenment funding is needed to provide repairs and upgrades to buildings and equiptment.
This wonderful place is so much more than bricks and mortar it was often the beginning of great memories for so many.It needs a facelift before it is lost forever and can never be rescued so it can continue with the invaluble work that the Hargreaves dedicated thier life to .
This would be a boost to the comunity both local and national and would change the lives of so many
Please sign to show your support and help make the future !!!!
